## Trip Advisor
- Google Sheet Link (Copy) https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WJ19g43YFDRi72kMPUiL_aCSsPcPVV1ZGC0xK__jL5k/edit?gid=2109795639#gid=2109795639

- Apify Actor - https://console.apify.com/actors/dbEyMBriog95Fv8CW/input
### Give a city name as input

json.name: Crowne Plaza Pune City Centre By IHG
json.description: Welcome to Crowne Plaza Pune City Centre, ideally situated in the heart of the city, offering a strategic location near the airport and railway station for convenient access. Our hotel boasts 173 spacious rooms designed for comfort and relaxation, along with a range of amenities including a swimming pool, spa, and gym to ensure a rejuvenating stay. Indulge your taste buds at Mosaic, our multi-cuisine restaurant that offers a culinary journey with food options from around the globe, prepared by our talented chefs. Experience the breathtaking panoramic view of the city at Evviva, our sky lounge. Enjoy a variety of cocktails, delicious food, and a vibrant atmosphere with multi-genre music to enhance your evening. With meeting and banqueting spaces spread over a total area of 11025 square feet, we offer versatile options for your events.
json.address: Cts No. 37 & 37/1 Bund Garden Road, Next To Jehangir Hospital, Pune 411001 India

json.localAddress: Cts No. 37 & 37/1, Bund Garden Road, Next To Jehangir Hospital, 411001

roomTips.text: The best hotel I can suggest is crowne plaza, Pune city center
Must visit
Plz Look This Stay for the next Stay of ur highly recommended
Look forward to the dining experience. Really very good.

json.name: The HHI Pune
json.description: Luxury Boutique Hotel in Viman Nagar Pune. One KM from the Pune Airport. Personalized service, Designer Resto-Bar with Private Dining areas,Pan Asian open air restaurant and Open air roof top Indian restaurant with live barbecue Buffet dinner. In room spa, Gym, luxurious suite.
json.address: 33/1/1, Neco Bund, Plot 2H Garden Rd, Pune 411014 India
json.hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

roomTips.text: If there is an event or a party, you will not be able to dine in.
Teach the staff first, major lapse in service. Training is required. Management is sleeping. Read my complain letter .
I will not refer to anyone
Please have a look at the room physically before booking, because they also have a room without a bathtub, which is worse than what I mentioned.
Reception team needs training

json.name: Novotel Pune Nagar Road
json.address: Weikfield It City Infopark Viman Nagar, Pune 411014 India
json.localAddress: Weikfield It City Infopark, Viman Nagar, 411014
json.hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Accor Hotels.

roomTips.text: The hotel is right on the main highway so becomes crowded. Pheonix mall is just a 5 minutes walk so avoid during weekends and pak hours
Call the property in advance before reaching there.
I prefer comfortable beds and neat and clean washroom. Highly recommended this property.
Avoid like the plague, choose another hotel if possible
brand like Novotel should lead with hospitality, not limitations.

json.name: Four Points By Sheraton Hotel & Serviced Apartments, Pune
json.description: Nestled in the dynamic Viman Nagar area & in close proximity to prominent business hubs of Pune like Kharadi, Magarpatta & Hadapsar, with seamless access to Pune Airport, Phoenix Market City, prominent business hubs such as World Trade Center, EON IT Park & top multinational companies including BNY, Maersk, ADP, Fiserv, Amazon, WNS & Barclays. Perfectly suited for business & leisure travelers, our apartment hotel boasts 217 elegantly designed rooms & expansive serviced apartments. After a full day, pamper yourself with a massage at The Spa, relax with a swim in our outdoor pool, or work out in our fully equipped fitness center. Savor delectable cuisine at any of our hotel's two on-site restaurants, including The Eatery & Awadh 5. With a vast 15,500 sq. ft. of banquet & meeting spaces, the hotel provides ideal venues for both corporate & social events. Whether you're in town for business or staycation with family, Four Points by Sheraton Pune promises an unforgettable experience.
json.address: 5th Mile Stone Viman Nagar, Pune 411014 India
json.localName: Four Points By Sheraton Hotel & Serviced Apartments, Pune
json.hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

roomTips.text: The pool time can be increased a Little
Opt for the higher floors with city view.
The food is good so make sure to try it .
More intercontinental dishes in the restaurants would help
Ideal place to say at Pune

json.name: The Westin Pune Koregaon Park
json.description: The Westin Pune Koregaon Park is centrally located in the city, which is just 5 Kms from the Airport. Also in the vicinity are EON Kharadi, Business Bay, Yerwada, Magarpatta and Hadapsar, all IT hotspots. Industrial belts like Chakan, Ranjangaon, Pirangut and Talegaon lie within a 25-kilometer radius. As it is located in the heart of the city, the hotel is just walking distance to tourists spots as well as Social & Cultural hubs of Pune. The Westin Pune Koregaon Park is pet friendly and includes the Heavenly Spa by Westin, In-Room Spa and WestinWORKOUT Fitness studio for our discerning guests. With 1,470 square meters of meeting space with additional outdoor lawns, and an entire level for our restaurants, bar, nightclub, our 5-star hotel is an ideal choice for all travelers. Our 277 stylish guest rooms and suites include Westin Executive Club Rooms. Few of our rooms come with terraces.
json.address: 36/3-b Koregaon Park Annexe, Mundhwa Road, Ghorpadi Mundhwa Road, Ghorpadi, Pune 411001 India

roomTips.text: I would say that the sleep quality is the best...
Concierge is awesome when u need ideas
No need to buy water - lots available at front desk and room.
Avoid at all cost. Does not be behave like a 5 star establishment.
All good !

json.name: Fairfield By Marriott Pune Kharadi
json.description: Situated just under 5 miles from the Pune International Airport, Fairfield by Marriott Pune Kharadi offers a convenient and comfortable stay. The EON IT Park, World Trade Center, Ranjangaon MIDC, and Viman Nagar are nearby locations. Enjoy complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, an all-day dining restaurant, a well-equipped fitness center, three modern meeting spaces, and a fully-equipped business center. Hosting an event in Pune, reserve one of our versatile indoor and outdoor venues, complemented by smart catering and comprehensive planning services.

json.name: Hyatt Pune
json.description: Hyatt Pune is a part of the incredible world of Hyatt. Located just 10 minutes from Pune Airport, 5 minutes from Phoenix Market City, and 15 minutes from the IT hub, Hyatt Pune has the perfect location, whether you’re traveling for work or leisure. Take advantage of our world-class Shanti spa where Ayurvedic treatments, reiki, and yoga relaxes and re-energize you. There’s something for everyone, with a scenic outdoor pool, garden suites, and round-the-clock room service, you will be spoilt for choice. Our three in-house restaurants- Baan Tao, Café 88, The Terrace Bar and TG's make dining decadent. Baan Tao is an award-winning restaurant, famed for its Thai and Chinese cuisine complemented by the ambiance of unique open-to-sky Thai Sala. If you’re in the mood for alfresco to enjoy Pune’s famously pleasant year-round weather, our restaurants are the perfect picks for you. At Hyatt Pune, there’s a world of possibility and the promise of solace. Come, check-in.
json.address: 88, Nagar Road Adjacent To Aga Khan Palace, Pune 411006 India
json.localAddress: 88, Nagar Road, Adjacent To Aga Khan Palace, 411006
json.hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

roomTips.text: Hotel is located at a convenient travel time of less than 10 mints from airport and nearest metro station.
Room services can improve and can provide small selves to keep clothes and in washroom also shelves need .
Ask for a quiet room. The hotel has a lot of events
Glass window are visible from outside
Come here, Unwind, Use the Spa, Pool and Delicious Food, the staff took special care and are super friendly. My goo hotel in Pune, Keepitup.

json.name: The Corinthians Resort
json.description: Nestled in tranquillity, The Corinthians Resort & Club, Pune, is a haven of relaxation and rejuvenation where you can immerse yourself in a world of calm amidst the enchantment of nature and the finest of luxuries, including 181 plush rooms and an array of banquet venues with 60,000 square feet of open space, a unit of NYATI HOTELS AND RESORTS PRIVATE LTD. We promise you exceptional gastronomic experiences, best-in-class amenities, warm hospitality, and a memorable stay.
json.address: Corinthians Club Internal Rd NIBM Annex, Pune 411060 India
json.localAddress: Corinthians Club Internal Rd, NIBM Annex, 411060

roomTips.text:
The place was  very welcoming   and staff was very efficient.
The guys Govind and Babu were really nice and helpful.
Also room is so good.
Pool is good! Food is awesome. The staff is very helpful
No everything is perfect
Cleniness, service, ambience is excellent. If you want to have spicy food don't go for buffet, go for ala carte so that you can ask spicy.
Everything at this resort, is outdated, not maintained, and filthy

json.name: The Fern Residency Pune, Woodland, Series by Marriott
json.description: With pocket friendly solutions and 87, 3-star equivalent rooms, Woodland is located minutes away from the Pune railway station. It has all the major restaurants, entertainment centres and transport hubs in its vicinity. This makes it a perfect choice for businessmen, students and travellers who come into the city for a brief period of time. Its convenient location also makes it a perfect choice to organize meetings and seminars. This coupled with a comfortable, yet affordable stay Woodland brings you the best of both worlds

Very clean and comfortable rooms.
Friendly, helpful staff who make check-ins and stays smooth.

Rooms need little more cleanliness 
Should be sprayed as  saw some cockroges
Keep it up

json.name: E-Square The Fern Pune, Series by Marriott
json.description: INTRODUCTION:The E-SQUARE Hotel is a charming little hotel that's big on style. Unlike the sameness of everyday hotels, our themed rooms coupled with warm attentive service combine to create a stylish escape that one can consider home! Located at E-SQUARE Multiplex in the University area, the Hotel is 12 km from Lohegaon Airport and 5 km from the Pune Railway station. The Hotel is also in close driving proximity of Business Districts of Pune - 5 minutes from Senapati Bapat Road, JM Road & FC Road, 15 minutes from Koregaon Park, MG Road & Camp and amidst malls like Pune Central, Westside, Shopper's Stop etc. The Hotel is boutique property with rooms in the following categories: Boutique, Deluxe, Superior, Suite. GST Extra. The above rates are INCLUSIVE of the following: • Complimentary Buffet Breakfast.• Free WI FI Internet Connections.• Use of RECHARGE - The Gym and Swimming pool.• 1 Bottle of Packaged Drinking Water replenished daily.• Electric Tea / Coffee Maker with replenishments
json.address: 133a, University Road, Ganeshkhind Ganeshkhind, Shivaji Nagar, Pune 411016 India

roomTips.text: The lift might take a bit more than you expect, and the buffet closes by 9.50 am
Its still getting into Marriot standards but it is still very good maintained and very great experience staying with them.
Most of the amenities mentioned are not available
Parking or drop in is little confusing as it is in a mall on 5th floor
Mr Swapnil for room service was great!
